mortal.translation[0].definitions[0].def: not able to live for ever
mortal.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Her father’s death reminded her that she was mortal.
mortal.translation[0].definitions[1].def: human – used especially when comparing humans with gods, spirits etc
mortal.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Both gods and mortal men found her captivating.
mortal.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a human – used especially when comparing humans with gods, spirits etc
